marquee.content_cn: Dear members, in the current fast payment and WeChat payment maintenance, the company provides bank deposit, Alipay payment, online payment, UnionPay scan code, virtual currency, please refer to the above recharge methods.

important Notice:
Members please pay attention! ! ! !
If you see the EG990 cooperation or EG990 merger announcement in other casinos
Everything is fake, please don't be fooled!
EG990 currently does not have any relevant cooperative casinos. If you have any questions, please consult the 24-hour customer service.

Hello Dear Member! Due to the rampant website hijacking in recent days, if you open a website other than our company or cannot open the webpage effectively, please use the online customer service system, QQ customer service, WeChat customer service to contact the company, or directly go to the EG990 navigation station to select a spare domain name to enter the company Do not provide personal information on non-company websites to maintain the security of your account information and funds! Thank you for your support for EG990!

★Important notice★: The receiving bank account of EG990 will be changed from time to time. Please re-acquire the latest receiving account before each remittance recharge. For example, if you deposit to a deactivated receiving account, the company cannot check and accept it. !
EG990 Thank you for your support and love!! ≧▽≦y
